channel.title: 317 pi How do i make pk point store need less points
channel.description: Ok its a 317 project insanity source. and i have a pk point shop. and my server just started so i want the points to be lower. how do i make it so i can access the pk point shop and make the item need less points.

item.title: 317 pi How do i make pk point store need less points
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.source: 317 pi How do i make pk point store need less points

item.title: 317 pi How do i make pk point store need less points
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

Shop Assistant

Search public int getSpecialItemValue

Find the item id’s. Say it’s a godsword, it would be…

case 11694: return 400;

case (Item ID):
return (amount of pkpoints needed to buy item);

So if you wanted to lower it 200 points it would be

Case 11694: return 200;

Read full topic
